languages.text: Вольный Торговец делает несколько шагов по коридору и заходится тяжелым кашлем — несомненно, последствие слишком долгого пребывания на мостике. Багровые пятна пачкают одежду и пол, Лорд-капитан трясет головой...

traits.locale_text: Вольный Торговец делает несколько шагов по коридору и заходится тяжелым кашлем — несомненно, последствие слишком долгого пребывания на мостике. Багровые пятна пачкают одежду и пол, Лорд-капитан трясет головой...

languages.text: The Rogue Trader takes a few steps down the corridor and breaks into a coughing fit — undoubtedly a result of spending too long on the bridge. Splashes of crimson stain {mf|his|her} clothes and the floor, and the Lord Captain shakes {mf|his|her} head...
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец делает несколько шагов по коридору и заходится тяжелым кашлем — несомненно, последствие слишком долгого пребывания на мостике. Багровые пятна пачкают одежду и пол, Лорд-капитан трясет головой...

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader takes a few steps down the corridor and breaks into a coughing fit — undoubtedly a result of spending too long on the bridge. Crimson stains the clothes and the floor, the Lord Captain shakes {mf|his|her} head...

The Rogue Trader takes a few steps down the corridor and breaks into a coughing fit — undoubtedly a result of spending too long on the bridge. Splashes of crimson stain {mf|his|her} clothes and the floor, and the Lord Captain shakes {mf|his|her} head...

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente da unos pasos por el pasillo y empieza a toser, probablemente por pasar demasiado tiempo en el puente. Sus ropas están manchadas de una sustancia roja. Menea la cabeza...
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader takes a few steps down the corridor and breaks into a coughing fit — undoubtedly a result of spending too long on the bridge. Splashes of crimson stain {mf|his|her} clothes and the floor, and the Lord Captain shakes {mf|his|her} head...

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente da unos pasos por el pasillo y empieza a toser, probablemente por pasar demasiado tiempo en el puente. Sus ropas están manchadas de una sustancia roja. Menea la cabeza...

languages.text: 行商浪人在走廊上走了几步之后，突然咳嗽起来。毫无疑问，{mf|他|她}在舰桥上实在是呆了太久。深红色的液体飞溅起来，染红了{mf|他|她}的制服和地板。领主舰长摇了摇头……
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader takes a few steps down the corridor and breaks into a coughing fit — undoubtedly a result of spending too long on the bridge. Splashes of crimson stain {mf|his|her} clothes and the floor, and the Lord Captain shakes {mf|his|her} head...

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人在走廊上走了几步之后，突然咳嗽起来。毫无疑问，{mf|他|她}在舰桥上实在是呆了太久。深红色的液体飞溅起来，染红了{mf|他|她}的制服和地板。领主舰长摇了摇头……

languages.text: 自由開拓者は廊下を数歩歩くと、咳き込むほどの発作を起こした。間違いなくブリッジで長時間過ごしすぎたせいだ。深紅の飛沫が自分の服と床を汚す。ロード・キャプテンは首を振った…
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader takes a few steps down the corridor and breaks into a coughing fit — undoubtedly a result of spending too long on the bridge. Splashes of crimson stain {mf|his|her} clothes and the floor, and the Lord Captain shakes {mf|his|her} head...

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者は廊下を数歩歩くと、咳き込むほどの発作を起こした。間違いなくブリッジで長時間過ごしすぎたせいだ。深紅の飛沫が自分の服と床を汚す。ロード・キャプテンは首を振った…

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} geht einige Schritte den Korridor hinunter und bricht in einen Hustenanfall aus — zweifellos eine Folge des zu langen Aufenthalts auf der Brücke. Blut befleckt seine Kleidung und den Boden, und der Lord Captain schüttelt den Kopf ...
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader takes a few steps down the corridor and breaks into a coughing fit — undoubtedly a result of spending too long on the bridge. Splashes of crimson stain {mf|his|her} clothes and the floor, and the Lord Captain shakes {mf|his|her} head...

languages.text: Après avoir fait quelques pas dans le couloir, {mf|le libre-marchand est pris|la libre-marchande est prise} d'une quinte de toux, sans doute parce qu'{mf|il est resté|elle est restée} trop longtemps sur le pont. {mf|Il|Elle} secoue la tête en voyant les taches écarlates qui souillent ses vêtements et le sol...
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader takes a few steps down the corridor and breaks into a coughing fit — undoubtedly a result of spending too long on the bridge. Splashes of crimson stain {mf|his|her} clothes and the floor, and the Lord Captain shakes {mf|his|her} head...

traits.locale_text: Après avoir fait quelques pas dans le couloir, {mf|le libre-marchand est pris|la libre-marchande est prise} d'une quinte de toux, sans doute parce qu'{mf|il est resté|elle est restée} trop longtemps sur le pont. {mf|Il|Elle} secoue la tête en voyant les taches écarlates qui souillent ses vêtements et le sol...

languages.text: Hür Tacir, koridorda birkaç adım atıp öksürük krizine giriyor. Belli ki köprüde çok uzun zaman geçirmenin bir yan etkisi... Kıpkırmızı lekeler kıyafetlerine ve yere sıçrıyor, Lord Kaptan başını sallıyor...
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader takes a few steps down the corridor and breaks into a coughing fit — undoubtedly a result of spending too long on the bridge. Splashes of crimson stain {mf|his|her} clothes and the floor, and the Lord Captain shakes {mf|his|her} head...
